alert.note: Alert for Chinati Mountains; Marfa Plateau; Presidio Valley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 10:06PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Presidio County through 1045 PM CDT... At 1006 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Adobes, or 12 miles north of Presidio, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Presidio, Adobes, Chinati Mountains, Shafter, Casa Piedra and Presidio Lely International Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Chinati Mountains; Marfa Plateau; Presidio Valley
